revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Unova |image = [[File:Victory Road Unova.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Victory Road Unova. |tokens = 326,500 |location = Unova Route 23 }} '''Victory Road Unova''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,003,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
